title: Perfect guacamole
description: What’s the secret to the perfect guacamole recipe? Lots of lime, a pinch of chilli and dollops of soured cream for extra smooth richness. Find out how to make it, here, then serve with fajitas, nachos or tacos.
ingredients: 1 finely chopped red chilli (remove the seeds if you don’t want your guacamole too spicy)
Nachos, crisps or crudités (raw pieces of carrot, cucumber, chicory), to serve

method.Step 1: Chop the avocados, put in a bowl, add the lime juice and soured cream, then mash with a fork.

method.Step 2: Stir in the chopped red onion and chilli. Season to taste, then serve.
